results.title: Going to Nan & Pop's Farm
results.creator_credit: Candice Jones and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’. Candice recounts the fond memories of visiting her grandparents’ flower farm. This story is told with animated illustrations, photographs and video footage.
results.description: Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’. results.title: Cardin Street
results.brief_description: A little piece of wood tells a whole story about a house, about home, about friendship. A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop Telling Tales. Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for Telling Tales.
results.description: A little piece of wood tells a whole story about a house, about home, about friendship. A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop Telling Tales. Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for Telling Tales.
description_for_label: A little piece of wood tells a whole story about a house, about home, about friendship. A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop Telling Tales. Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for Telling Tales.

results.title: A different perspective
results.brief_description: ‘I was given a photo pass to the 1994 Big Day Out. From then on, outside my day job I worked as a freelance photographer’. Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’.

results.title: The Brown dressing gown
results.brief_description: Patric fondly remembers his social worker Julie Wilson who helped him come out of his cocoon and discard his brown dressing gown. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Department of Human Services and The Deafness Foundation.

results.title: The Coat
results.brief_description: A story about a girl, her old coat, and why it is okay to be different. Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’.

results.title: Birth without knives
results.brief_description:
Please note: This film contains footage of a home birth, including nudity.

Created by ‘Asphyxia’, this film talks about the concerns regarding pregnancy, avoiding a caesarean birth and having a home birth.

Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’.
